title: Deep Learning
description: introduction to Deep Learning, why DeepLearning and why now?

title: Idea-Capture-AI
description: An offline AI-powered notebook that records your voice, transcribes it using whisper.cpp, and summarizes it with a local LLM. No APIs, no cloud — just fast, private idea capture directly on your machine.

title: The website: mY-bLoG
description: A small personal project to share my ideas, projects, and what I’m learning — all in one place. Built in the style of old-net to keep things simple, clean, and distraction-free
